name: removebg-webapp
description: Webapp para remoção automática de fundo de imagens totalmente no navegador usando @imgly/background-removal.

scripts.build:pwa: npm run build && cp public/manifest.json src/js/sw.js src/js/pwa.js dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ && cp -r public/screenshots dist/
scripts.build:netlify: npm run build:pwa && mkdir -p netlify-deploy-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && cp -r dist/* netlify-deploy-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)/ && echo 'Netlify deploy folder created: netlify-deploy-'$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)
